attributes.action: More should be done to prevent young adults from smoking
attributes.background: More and more young adults and children and smoking and vaping causing health problems and then we the tax payer have to pay when they fall ill from smoking, more should be done to prevent young adults and children from smoking and vaping. It's against the law but they can still do it.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
